title: Dragon's Crown Japanese Dub & English Sub patch
description:
ONLY THE DRACRO.CPK - NOT THE FULL GAME

The English files were replaced by the Japanese, and the Japanese with the English ones.

Modified the DRACRO.CPK files in "./msgsheet/" from "*FILENAME*_US.fms" to "*FILENAME*.fms" and vice versa.

One exception in the naming of the files is only at "ObjectParamMsg.fms" and "ObjectParam_US.fms".


__How-To_Install__
Copy DRACRO.CPK to "PS3_GAMEUSRDIRINST" and overwrite it.
(You should take a Backup before overwriting!)

__Important__
Language should be set to Japanese!
I don't know if there  exist any bugs!

This is fully experimental as with all custom translations.
